incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays to Telefonica O2 Network in Germany

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica O2 Network in Germany. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Issues to and From Telefonica O2 Network in Germany

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica O2 Network in Germany. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica O2 Network in Germany. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available. We apologize for the incorrect incident status shared in the previous post.

Upon further investigation, we have confirmed that Programming Messaging - SMS is not affected by the ongoing incident. We are actively monitoring the SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica O2 Network in Germany and will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as possible.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica O2 Network in Germany. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Failures Posting Update to Phone Number Records in IE1

incident_updates.body: Twilio Phone Numbers were degraded for 5 minutes between 13:15 and 13:20 Pacific Time on 05/17/2024. During this period of time customers from IE1 region could have been unable to update phone numbers.. The issue has now been resolved, Teams are monitoring for the next 30 minutes.

incidents.name: Service Disruption Impacting Flex, Voice, and Messaging

incident_updates.body: After monitoring our engineers are confident that the the service interruption has been fully resolved.

We have experienced a service interruption between 13:34 - 13:51 PT with:
Flex - Flex customers may have experienced errors when adding agents to voice meetings.
Voice - Call creation would have been unavailable during the impact window. Existing calls would have continued
Messaging - Messages would have been rejected or failed during the impact window

We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available

We have experienced a service interruption between 13:34 - 13:51 PT with:
Flex - Flex customers may have experienced errors when adding agents to voice meetings.
Voice - Call creation would have been unavailable during the impact window. Existing calls would have continued
Messaging - Messages would have been rejected or failed during the impact window

We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Programmable Voice. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Countries in Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays to multiple networks and countries in Africa. Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the incidents for each affected country. The following countries and respective network operators are impacted:

- Guinea: MTN, Celcom
- Mozambique: Vodacom
- Uganda: MTN
- Tanzania: TTCL, Viettel

We’re seeing recovery for these countries:

- Congo: Africell

We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Twilio SMS Delivery Delays to Claro Networks in the Dominican Republic Affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 2 hours and 42 minutes between 11:00 and 13:42 Pacific Time on 5/13/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced Delivery Delays to Claro Networks in the Dominican Republic. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is not Accessible and Delayed Data Uploads

incident_updates.body: The issue with the Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI has been resolved. We are no longer experiencing issues in accessing Flex Insight Dashboard data and delays while uploading data. Twilio Flex is operating normally at this time.

We have observed that the Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is now accessible and there is no delay in data uploads for our customers. To ensure a full recovery, we are monitoring the service and will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is currently inaccessible and there are delayed data uploads for some of our customers due to an issue on our vendor's end. Our engineers are actively working with the vendor to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Flex Insights Historical Dashboard UI is not accessible and delayed data uploads for few of our customer's, since there is an issue on our vendor's end and our engineers are actively working with them to fix the issue.
